title: The Mindstate
description:
The Mindstate is the child of the classic pintail carver, and the modern drop-through. The result is a board with lively carving abilities and a low ride for easy commuting. With a fiberglass reinforced flex, you can count a smooth and responsive ride with an easy push.

L: 37.50"
W: 8.75"
WB: 27.50"

The Mindstate features a Walnut topsheet, with art by Matt Smith.

Check out Arbor Skateboards everywhere:
arborcollective.com/skateboards
